deploy.startCommand: if [ "${RUN_REFRESH_WORKER:-false}" = "true" ]; then python dashboardserver.py --worker; else gunicorn wsgi:app --preload --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --workers ${WEB_CONCURRENCY:-2} --worker-class gevent --worker-connections ${GUNICORN_WORKER_CONNECTIONS:-1000} --timeout 120 --keep-alive 5 --log-level info; fi
